Text.Name: FacialScar
Text.Desc: There is a horrific scar on this person's face.

Text.Name: UglyFace1
Text.Desc: This person looks too ugly to be likable.

Text.Name: UglyFace2
Text.Desc: This person looks too terrifying to be a human.

Text.Name: BeautifulFace1
Text.Desc: This person is incredibly good-looking.

Text.Name: BeautifulFace2
Text.Desc: This person is incredibly good-looking.

Text.Name: OldViscusInjury
Text.Desc: This person's internal organs have been severely damaged, and they are not healing.

Text.Name: CrippleLeft
Text.Desc: This person has a limp in their left leg due to a long-term disease.

Text.Name: CrippleRight
Text.Desc: This person has a limp in their right leg due to a long-term disease.

Text.Name: BanLeftTibia
Text.Desc: This person's left leg has been severed.

Text.Name: BanRightTibia
Text.Desc: This person's left leg has been severed.

Text.Name: BanLeftScapula
Text.Desc: This person's whole left arm has been severed.

Text.Name: BanRightScapula
Text.Desc: This person's whole right arm has been severed.

Text.Name: Deaf
Text.Desc: This person was born deaf.

Text.Name: BanLeftEye
Text.Desc: Blind in the left eye.

Text.Name: BanRightEye
Text.Desc: Blind in the right eye.

Text.Name: BanLeftEar
Text.Desc: Deaf in the left ear.

Text.Name: BanRightEar
Text.Desc: Deaf in the right ear.

Text.Name: MeridianIncomplete
Text.Desc: This person was born with broken meridians.

Text.Name: HealthOverdraft1
Text.Desc: This person has not paid much attention to their health, and has a shorter lifespan than others.

Text.Name: HealthOverdraft2
Text.Desc: This person has not paid any attention to their health and has a much shorter lifespan than others.

Text.Name: HealthMaintain1
Text.Desc: This person knows how to maintain good health and has a longer lifespan than others.

Text.Name: HealthMaintain2
Text.Desc: This person knows how to maintain good health and has a much longer lifespan than others.

Text.Name: ColdPatience
Text.Desc: This person lives in a cold region and can handle cold weather well.

Text.Name: HotPatience
Text.Desc: This person lives in a hot region and can handle hot weather well.

Text.Name: DarkPatience
Text.Desc: This person likes dark places.

Text.Name: HighMan
Text.Desc: This person is taller and stronger than most people, so is more likely to solve problems with violence.

Text.Name: LowMan
Text.Desc: This person is short and small like a child, so is more likely to solve problems with intelligence.

Text.Name: NoHair
Text.Desc: This person has no hair.

Text.Name: LeftHanded
Text.Desc: This person is left-handed.

Text.Name: Mute
Text.Desc: This person cannot talk with other people.

Text.Name: RunFast
Text.Desc: This person is very agile and can walk very fast.

Text.Name: Indigestion
Text.Desc: This person has bad indigestion that hinders the absorption of nutrients.

Text.Name: IronStomach
Text.Desc: This person has extremely healthy digestion that helps with the absorption of nutrients.

Text.Name: GoodEyesight
Text.Desc: This person has good eyesight and can see very far.

Text.Name: ShallowSleep
Text.Desc: This person is likely to wake up in the middle of the night.
